duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead strategic assessment, initiation, execution, and management of platform development projects.
Contribute to enhancing competitive stance in the RIA Custody marketplace through internal and external research, project management, and new product launches.
Create and execute disciplined project management plans for a broad portfolio of platform/product projects.
Work closely with senior business unit leaders to perform operational discovery, planning, and optimization of operational project task forces.
Identify opportunities to enhance the pace of innovation by overcoming internal legacy system and process issues.
Perform ongoing RIA fintech solution research and analysis on demand/adoption in RIA sector.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or MBA in a relevant field (Project and Product management training/certification desired)
